alert.note: Alert for Delaware; Eastern Montgomery; Lower Bucks; Philadelphia (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 14 at 7:53AM EDT by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of east central Salem, Camden, Gloucester, northwestern Burlington, southeastern Montgomery, southeastern Bucks, Philadelphia and northeastern Delaware Counties through 830 AM EDT... At 752 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Bryn Mawr to West Deptford to near Woodstown. Movement was east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Philadelphia, Camden, Gloucester City, Cherry Hill, Bensalem, Evesham, Mount Laurel, Willingboro, Deptford, Voorhees, Medford, West Deptford, Glassboro, Lindenwold, Bellmawr, Yeadon, Woodbury, Burlington, Bristol and Pitman. This includes the following highways... New Jersey Turnpike between exits 2 and 4. Pennsylvania Turnpike between mile markers 348 and 357. Interstate 95 in Pennsylvania between mile markers 10 and 40. Interstate 76 in Pennsylvania between mile markers 329 and 351. Interstate 76 in New Jersey between mile markers 0 and 3. Interstate 295 in New Jersey between mile markers 17 and 47. Interstate 676 in Pennsylvania between mile markers 0 and 1. Interstate 676 in New Jersey between mile markers 0 and 4. Interstate 476 in Pennsylvania between mile markers 7 and 18. Atlantic City Expressway between mile markers 33 and 44. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.

area.areaDesc: Delaware; Eastern Montgomery; Lower Bucks; Philadelphia
